Mango Healthy: Plant certified disease-free grafts, maintain 10Ã—10 m spacing, prune annually after harvest for open canopy, ensure good drainage, apply balanced NPK + micronutrients, mulch basin, remove fallen leaves/fruits, spray copper oxychloride 0.3% once before monsoon and once after as preventive, clean orchard floor regularly.
Mango diseased: Prune and burn infected panicles/twigs immediately after harvest, rake and destroy fallen malformed inflorescences and mummified fruits, spray carbendazim 0.1% or thiophanate-methyl 0.1% alternately with copper oxychloride 0.3% at 15-day intervals for powdery mildew/anthracnose, apply trichoderma or pseudomonas soil drench for stem-end rot/wilt, avoid overhead irrigation during flowering.
